name: Craft iron shovel
goal: Craft an iron shovel from an iron ingot and sticks using a crafting table
notes: The iron shovel digs dirt, sand, gravel, clay, soul sand, and snow significantly faster than stone. It has 250 durability. Can also create grass paths by right-clicking on grass blocks. Requires a crafting table.

steps.title: Obtain an iron ingot
steps.details: You need 1 iron ingot. Smelt raw iron or iron ore in a furnace. See 'Gather iron ingot' recipe for all ways to obtain iron ingots.
checks: Have at least 1 iron_ingot in inventory

steps.title: Obtain sticks
steps.details: You need 2 sticks. Craft from 2 planks (yields 4 sticks). Skip if you already have sticks.
checks: Have at least 2 sticks in inventory

steps.title: Craft the iron shovel
steps.details: Use a crafting table. Place 1 iron ingot in top-center, 1 stick in middle-center, 1 stick in bottom-center. Recipe: { "recipe": "iron_shovel", "count": 1 }.
